text.autoconfig.lambdabettergrass.option:
Enables the better snow feature.
If enabled some blocks may have a snowy variation used and/or a snow layer added when snow is nearby.
Note: this also works for other snow-like blocks which have layers if the correct files are present.

Enables the better grass feature.
 - OFF disables the better grass feature entirely.
 - FASTEST will copy the top texture on every side of the grass block. Similar to OptiFine's Fast option.
 - FAST will connect the grass block textures like OptiFine's Fancy option.
 - FANCY will connect the grass block textures and smoothen the side textures of nearby grass blocks.
text.autoconfig.lambdabettergrass.title: LambdaBetterGrass configuration
